List.Name: Protection
List.Description: Take X less physical damage for this turn.

List.Name: Fragile
List.Description: Take X additional physical damage for this turn.

List.Name: Burn
List.Description: At the end of the turn, take X fixed damage, then halve the stack.

List.Name: Bleed
List.Description: Upon playing an attack card, take X fixed damage, then halve the stack.

List.Name: Stunned
List.Description: All card slots become unavailable for X turns.

List.Name: Silenced
List.Description: The left-most available card slot becomes unavailable.

List.Name: Enchanted
List.Description: Used for certain card effects. At the end of the turn, exhausts.

List.Name: Discard
List.Description: Return a card from your hand to the deck.

List.Name: Exhaust
List.Description: Remove a card for the rest of the battle.

List.Name: Item
List.Description: Card is removed from the deck when played.

List.Name: Instant
List.Description: Card is played immediately upon being assigned to a card slot.
